name: uncancelled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If an event or a service is uncancelled, it has not been cancelled (= stopped or no longer happening): Passengers wait to find out where they might find an uncancelled train to get them home.
If an event or a service is uncancelled, it is cancelled (= stopped or no longer happening), but then a decision is made that it will happen or continue: She talks about a movie release that got cancelled, then uncancelled, with a lot of drama in between.
If a stamp is uncancelled, it has been used but not marked to show it has been used: Is it dishonest to re-use uncancelled stamps?
More examplesFewer examplesThere was the annoying ceaseless noise of uncancelled system alerts.There remained an uncancelled broadband service on the line.The standing order had remained uncancelled through all adversities.It was unclear whether refunds should go to customers who missed uncancelled flights for lockdown reasons.
